CGi Artist Makes a Masterpiece Everyday For 12 Years. And it took me over 2 years finding out why he calls himself *Beep* -le. Thanks @CorridorDigital!

We had the honor of joining @beeple on one of his 45min daily renders. That means create, render, and post all within 45-minutes. It was intense and we made a Corridor crew video about it, OUT NOW!! Watch here -> https://youtu.be/_ul9jrCXhR4
true story.  no chance in hell i'd still be doing this after 12 years if i wasn't having a fuckload of fun with it.  ;)
